Privacy Policy

Last Updated: February 15, 2026

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy explains how COREBOT collects, uses, and protects user information.

2. Information We Collect

COREBOT may collect and store the following information strictly for functionality purposes:

  • Message-related data required for bot commands

3. How We Use Information

The collected data is used only to provide and improve bot functionality.

4. Data Storage

Data is stored securely and is not sold, shared, or distributed to third parties.

5. Data Removal

Users may request deletion of their stored data by contacting the developer.

6. Changes to This Policy

This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time without prior notice.

7. Contact

If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact the developer.
